summary: ever thought storm magic looks retarded, ever thougt conjuration is useless, ever thought paralysis is stupid then this mod fixes that all
descriptionHtml:
my first mod ever and most probably last knowing me...
this mod brings you a quite overpowered spell it looks awesome it paralyses it packs a punch and it reanimates about everything i just created it for me but i thought: man these dragons are WEAK huhm maybe some other people might wanna get this spell too i like it
so that is why i uploaded it
so that is basicly it
furthermore i strongly recomand 
-the flying ring mod                   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15775

that\\\'s it really that\\\'s it
